title: SET_PLANE_TURBULENCE_MULTIPLIER
content:
0xAD2D28A1AFDFF1310xED159AE6// SetPlaneTurbulenceMultiplier
void SET_PLANE_TURBULENCE_MULTIPLIER(Vehicle vehicle, float multiplier);Parameters:vehicle: The plane to set the multiplier formultiplier: The turbulence multiplier. Value between 0.0 and 1.0This native sets the turbulence multiplier. It only works for planes.
0.0 = no turbulence at all.
1.0 = heavy turbulence.Works by just calling it once, does not need to be called every tick.Examples:Lualocal plane = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
if IsThisModelAPlane(GetEntityModel(plane)) then
    -- Goodbye turbulence!
    SetPlaneTurbulenceMultiplier(plane, 0.0)
end
codeBlocks:
// SetPlaneTurbulenceMultiplier
void SET_PLANE_TURBULENCE_MULTIPLIER(Vehicle vehicle, float multiplier);

local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for SET_PLANE_TURBULENCE_MULTIPLIER
SetPlaneTurbulenceMultiplier(vehicle, 0.0)
